Uses of Class
mortar.api.world.Cuboid

  • Packages that use Cuboid 
    Package Description
    mortar.api.world  

    • Uses of Cuboid in mortar.api.world

      Methods in mortar.api.world that return Cuboid 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Cuboid Cuboid.clone() 
      Cuboid Cuboid.contract()
      Contract the Cuboid, returning a Cuboid with any air around the edges removed, just large enough to include all non-air blocks.
      Cuboid Cuboid.contract(Cuboid.CuboidDirection dir)
      Contract the Cuboid in the given direction, returning a new Cuboid which has no exterior empty space.
      Cuboid Cuboid.expand(Cuboid.CuboidDirection dir, int amount)
      Expand the Cuboid in the given direction by the given amount.
      Cuboid Cuboid.flatten(int level) 
      Cuboid Cuboid.getBoundingCuboid(Cuboid other)
      Get the Cuboid big enough to hold both this Cuboid and the given one.
      Cuboid Cuboid.getFace(Cuboid.CuboidDirection dir)
      Get the Cuboid representing the face of this Cuboid.
      Cuboid Cuboid.inset(Cuboid.CuboidDirection dir, int amount)
      Inset (shrink) the Cuboid in the given direction by the given amount.
      Cuboid Cuboid.outset(Cuboid.CuboidDirection dir, int amount)
      Outset (grow) the Cuboid in the given direction by the given amount.
      Cuboid Cuboid.shift(Cuboid.CuboidDirection dir, int amount)
      Shift the Cuboid in the given direction by the given amount.
      Cuboid Area.toCuboid() 
      Methods in mortar.api.world with parameters of type Cuboid 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Cuboid Cuboid.getBoundingCuboid(Cuboid other)
      Get the Cuboid big enough to hold both this Cuboid and the given one.
